targetLine.text: See? Now you respect me, because I’m a threat . That’s the way it works! Turns out there’s a lot of people, whole countries who want respect. And they will pay through the nose to get it. How do you think I got rich? I build weapons. And now I have a weapon only I can defeat. And when I unleash it, I’ll get— Ah!

contextBefore.text: Look, I was wrong to treat you that way.... I’m sorry! But you're making a big problem since a long time ago!

contextAfter.text: You sly dog! You got me monologuing! I can’t believe it....
It’s cool, huh? Zero-point energy. I saved the best powers for myself.
Am I good enough now ? Who’s super now ?? I’m Syndrome! Your nemesis and-
